name: data-space-example
description: Please enter a brief description here

scripts.check: npm run typecheck && npm run lint
scripts.assemble: npm run dataspace && npm run compile
scripts.assemble:production: npm run dataspace && npm run compile:production
scripts.build: npm run dataspace && npm run check && npm run compile
scripts.build:production: npm run dataspace && npm run check && npm run compile:production
scripts.servers: npm run build && concurrently -k "node dist/server-runner/analytics-company-runner.js" "node dist/server-runner/moodle-runner.js" "node dist/server-runner/q-s-world-university-runner.js" "node dist/server-runner/university-runner.js"
scripts.servers:production: npm run build:production && concurrently -k "node dist/server-runner/analytics-company-runner.js" "node dist/server-runner/moodle-runner.js" "node dist/server-runner/q-s-world-university-runner.js" "node dist/server-runner/university-runner.js"
